sub_subject.name: Systematic Theology (The Loci of Doctrine)
sub_subject.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Systematic Theology (The Loci of Doctrine) (Bible & Theology)

objectives.topic_name: Angelology: The Doctrine of Spiritual Beings
objectives.objective_text: Identify angels as God's messengers.

objectives.objective_text: Name Gabriel who spoke to Mary.

objectives.objective_text: Name Adam and Eve.

objectives.objective_text: Name the Old and New Testaments.

objectives.objective_text: Identify that God cannot lie.

objectives.objective_text: Name the Bible as the book that is never wrong.

objectives.objective_text: Identify the Bible as God's special letter to us.

objectives.objective_text: Name the Bible as the only book that is perfectly true.

objectives.objective_text: Name Jesus as the only one who never sinned.

objectives.objective_text: Name Jesus as the King who is coming back.

objectives.objective_text: Name Faith as trusting Jesus.

objectives.objective_text: Identify God as the King of the world.

objectives.objective_text: Recall that we must obey what God says.

objectives.objective_text: Observe that we should be ready for Him.

objectives.objective_text: Observe the fruit of the Spirit (love, joy, peace).
